document.full_text: puma  said it aims to reach the 3 billion euro ($4.36 billion) sales mark this year, earlier than expected, as it reported record first quarter sales driven by growth in the united states.
document.title: puma raises target after u.s. drives record q1 sales
lines_and_colors: puma  said it aims to reach the 3 billion euro ($4.36 billion) sales mark this year, earlier than expected, as it reported record first quarter sales driven by growth in the united states.
